localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: With a sigh and a smile, you consented. What is marriage, you muse, but the union of two kindred souls?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: With a sigh and a smile, you consented. What is marriage, you muse, but the union of two kindred souls?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Though she is your own blood, it could not be allowed, no matter how deep your familial bond.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Though she is your own blood, it could not be allowed, no matter how deep your familial bond.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You allowed the marriage with great celebration and expressions of joy. Love must be respected beyond all else.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You allowed the marriage with great celebration and expressions of joy. Love must be respected beyond all else.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Love is admirable, but marriage is more than emotion. You denied their union; your word must be respected.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Love is admirable, but marriage is more than emotion. You denied their union; your word must be respected.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You remembered your own marriage with a wistful smile. Knowing that true love cannot be denied, you consented.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You remembered your own marriage with a wistful smile. Knowing that true love cannot be denied, you consented.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You stayed your anger through familial love, but could not consent to this marriage. Never.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is no disharmony in love, only balance - of course you allowed the marriage!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: "Who am I to stand in the way of true love?", you mused, before refusing your permission anyway.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: If we destroyed their buildings, their supplies would be destroyed also. You ordered it done.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: If we destroyed their buildings, their supplies would be destroyed also. You ordered it done.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Destroying the walls may create a breach through which we can attack; you told your general to make it so.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Destroying the walls may create a breach through which we can attack; you told your general to make it so.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You do nothing. There is time yet to decide what course to take.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You do nothing. There is time yet to decide what course to take.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The risk is worth the reward; you ordered the dam destroyed. It has hurt them far more than it has us!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The risk is worth the reward; you ordered the dam destroyed. It has hurt them far more than it has us!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: To inflict our war on innocent civilians is unconscionable. You could not do it - would not do it!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: To inflict our war on innocent civilians is unconscionable. You could not do it - would not do it!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You decided that any opportunity to bring this battle to a swift conclusion must be taken.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You decided that any opportunity to bring this battle to a swift conclusion must be taken.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There was no telling if this was simply a trick, so you did nothing - this siege will end soon enough.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There was no telling if this was simply a trick, so you did nothing - this siege will end soon enough.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This course of action is distinctly underhanded - you declared you would have no part in it.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This course of action is distinctly underhanded - you declared you would have no part in it.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: They are isolated and alone - the illness would hurt them far more than us. You ordered it to be so!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: They are isolated and alone - the illness would hurt them far more than us. You ordered it to be so!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Our troops' suffering must be alleviated. You ordered medicine to be sent at once!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Our troops' suffering must be alleviated. You ordered medicine to be sent at once!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: But of course! You've always been ready and happy to toast to your comrades' health and the coming victory!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: But of course! You've always been ready and happy to toast to your comrades' health and the coming victory!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You were honoured that they asked you to join, but declined, citing pressing work to be done and rest to be taken.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You were honoured that they asked you to join, but declined, citing pressing work to be done and rest to be taken.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Their cowardice was evident, but they are civilians all the same; victims of this brutal war. You decided to let them go.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Their cowardice was evident, but they are civilians all the same; victims of this brutal war. You decided to let them go.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: If the enemy wanted them back, he would pay handsomely for them, so you issued a ransom note.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: If the enemy wanted them back, he would pay handsomely for them, so you issued a ransom note.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: An enemy is an enemy. No mercy; You had them executed at once.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: An enemy is an enemy. No mercy; You had them executed at once.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We must take whatever aid we can get in these difficult times.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We must take whatever aid we can get in these difficult times.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We did not need this aid - that village needs supplies more sorely than we do.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We did not need this aid - that village needs supplies more sorely than we do.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You ordered the rocks to be sent down immediately; never let an advantage pass you by.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You ordered the rocks to be sent down immediately; never let an advantage pass you by.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There was no need. You ordered the men to stand down. The enemy will fail in time.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There was no need. You ordered the men to stand down. The enemy will fail in time.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You knew of bandits who would do this for you, and spared yourself the resources.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You knew of bandits who would do this for you, and spared yourself the resources.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You ordered a fire to be started using our supplies, and smoked them out of the tunnels.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You ordered a fire to be started using our supplies, and smoked them out of the tunnels.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You ordered the tunnels to be collapsed, even knowing the risk of injury to our men.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You ordered the tunnels to be collapsed, even knowing the risk of injury to our men.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is still time before they get to us, so you chose to do nothing.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is still time before they get to us, so you chose to do nothing.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You ordered them to throw caution to the wind and dug through the seam. After all, time is of the essence!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You ordered them to throw caution to the wind and dug through the seam. After all, time is of the essence!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Safety first! You told your general to provide the wood needed to stabilise the tunnel, and cleared the obstacle.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: With a quick parry, you knocked the blade out of the would-be assassins grasp, but he managed to escape through a nearby window.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You leapt behind one of your accompanying generals, who was critically wounded. Courtesy of your bodyguards, the assassin was soon dead.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You leapt behind one of your accompanying generals, who was critically wounded. Courtesy of your bodyguards, the assassin was soon dead.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You averted death with an instinctive sidestep, narrowly avoiding the assassins blade. Your men quickly ensured he did not avoid theirs!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You suffered a serious, but non-fatal wound, before your men struck the assailant down. You will live heaven has bigger plans for you!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You let the prisoners go, for they are men of lost purpose and no longer a danger to you, regardless of their loyalties.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You offered the prisoners payment to serve you. Loyalty always has a price as long as its more than the previous warlord paid!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Appealing to the prisoners yourself, you assured them that serving you would bring them glory, riches, and the chance to see faraway lands.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You ordered the prisoners beheaded. If they wouldn't pledge their full allegiance to you, they will never serve another!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You ordered the military to assist the migration the martial presence ensured a safer passage, and more people were encouraged to relocate.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You had more important matters to attend to the people migrated on their own terms, and at their own risk.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Construction was put on hold whilst you waited for these strange goings-on to blow over.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The workers were offered inflated pay-rates to continue, which most accepted. These pesky spirits have to put up with us, and we with them.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A [[i]]fangxiangshi[[/i]] was summoned at great cost to perform exorcism rites, resulting in the lost souls being expelled from their old hovel.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Not one to trifle with supernatural matters, you ordered all construction to stop and for everyone to stay away from the area indefinitely.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Not one to trifle with supernatural matters, you ordered all construction to stop and for everyone to stay away from the area indefinitely.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The past cannot be changed. The remaining workforce in the town were ordered to continue.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: It was too late for the dead, but the work had to go on. More men were brought in to swiftly replace the lost workforce.
